subject: Re: [junit] How to test without returning any return value.
msgSnippet: you should create small pieces of code which returns some value and after that you create a bigger code calling the smalls. then you have to create the Junit
messageBody:
you should create small pieces of code which returns some value and after
that you create a bigger code calling the smalls.

then you have to create the Junit tests for the small pieces of code.

Wmiro.


----- Original Message -----
From: "kavitha arumugam" <kavi_sydney@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 2004 7:19 AM
Subject: [junit] How to test without returning any return value.


> Dear All,
>

> }

> Cheers,
